context: Hi, what movies do you like?

Hi Well, I like scary movies, but I am looking for something family appropriate. I liked Despicable Me (2010), Despicable Me 2 (2013) , and Despicable Me 3 (2017) but not Minions (2015) Plus it doesn't have to be animated
resp: Sure, I'd recommend Incredibles 2 (2018) and Christopher Robin (2018) from this year.
